data.text: Ɔba nyansafo tie nʼagya nkyerɛkyerɛ;
Nneɛma pa a efi onipa anom no ma no anigye,
Nea ɔkora nʼano no kora ne nkwa so,
Onihawfo pere hwehwɛ nanso onya hwee,
Atreneefo kyi nea ɛnyɛ nokware,
Trenee bɔ ɔnokwafo ho ban,
Obi yɛ ne ho sɛ ɔdefo, a nso onni hwee,
Obi ahonya betumi agye no nkwa,
Atreneefo kanea hyerɛn pa ara,
Ahantan de ntɔkwaw nko ara na ɛba,
Ahonya a ɛnam ɔkwammɔne so no hwere ntɛm so,
Anidaso a wotu hyɛ da no bɔ koma ɔyare,
Nea otwiri akwankyerɛ no betua so ka,
Onyansafo nkyerɛkyerɛ te sɛ nkwa asuti,
Nhumu pa de adom ba,
Ɔbadwemma biara yɛ nʼade wɔ nimdeɛ mu,
Ɔsomafo mumɔyɛfo tɔ amane mu,
Nea ɔpo nteɛso no kɔ ohia ne animguase mu,
Akɔnnɔde a nsa aka ma ɔkra ani gye,
Nea ɔne onyansafo nantew no hu nyansa,
Ɔhaw di ɔbɔnefo akyi,
Onipa pa de agyapade gyaw ne nenanom,
Ohiani afum nnɔbae tumi ba pii,
Nea ɔkyɛe nʼabaa so no tan ne ba,
Atreneefo didi ma wɔn koma mee,
